ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The people of Lut denied the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Lot's people also gave the lie to the warnings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of Lot rejected Our warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The people of Lut denied the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: The people of Lut denied the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The people of Lut treated the warning. as a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The people of Lot cried lies to the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: The folk of Lot rejected warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The people of Lot rejected Our warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The people of Lut belied the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And the people of Lot denied the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The people of Lut rejected (his) warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: The people of Lout (Lot) belied the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The nation of Lot belied Our warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The people of Lot rejected the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The people of Lot denied the warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:33] The people of Lot denied the warnings, [they denied] those issues of which they were warned by his [Lot’s] tongue.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (The folk of Lot rejected warnings) they rejected Lot as well as all the messengers.
